name: kelly robinson
text: Nice franchise pizza place. Not a big fan of the Cuban sandwich, but my son enjoyed his Calzone. Probably won't be back.

name: Christopher Weeks
text: Would have given this place 4, maybe 5 stars if it weren't for this one issue I had with the pizza. The toppings on the pizza were actually really good. The sausage were a nice size and tasted like actual sausage. The cheese was nice and â€¦More

name: J. Heath Lloyd
text: Clean. Friendly staff.  Really good pizza.  We ate in the restaurant, they obviously cater to take out - but booth was nice.  Good experience.  We'll go back.

name: Marcus Davis
text: I love the way these guys serve their customer, they're so polite and have great attitudes. I'm in love with the Gourmet style pizza. I couldn't think of a better place to dine at. Cottage Inn Pizza is the greatest.

name: Malinda Upchurch
text: Best deep dish we've found since moving to Greensboro from Indiana! Staff were very friendly & helpful, since it was our first time there. Lots of toppings and the breadsticks were great. Only down side, it's set up more for take out and not a dine in experience. We will defiantly go back!! ðŸ˜ƒ

name: Tevin Jessup
text: There was a worker named David who helped us and made sure that we had everything we need he was very polite and helped us with everything we needed

name: angel branch
text: Food was delicious and service was awesome!! Had the Philly Pizza and Apple dessert pizza. Everything was wonderful! Definitely get the garlic cream cheese!

name: Joe Langenbacher
text: Best pizza in the area.  Make sure you add a garlic cream cheese cup.  You won't regret it.  Glad to have them in Greensboro.

name: tianathomas20
text: Their food was good but are they ever opening back up?

name: Dwayne Fonville Jr
text: Service was awesome and food was even better. I don't highly rate places often but I they are good here.

name: Ashley Ray
text: This food is phenomenal!!! They have pizza, subs, salad, and so much more! They even sold me on their one-of-a-kind Apple Piezza. It's based with a cream cheese filling and the catch is I HATE cream cheese, but i LOVE their Apple Piezza!!! â€¦More

name: Talaisha Whitaker
text: Pizza is amazing!!!!!! The gourmet pizzas are consistently made well!! I would totally come back again!! Love the garlic cream cheese.  Only place in town that has is.

name: Jeff Hasho
text: AMAZING PIZZA! BBQ Chicken Pizza is my all time favorite! Friendly staff and quick delivery, a very well deserved 5 Star!

name: James Witherell
text: I love Cottage Inn Pizza. Without a doubt the best pizza I've ever eaten!  Their homemade ranch is an amazing addition as well!

name: Karlee Sams
text: delivery was very fast. this was my first time trying Cottage Inn Pizza and I ordered the feta cheese bread and goodness it was great ! very flavorful.

name: Olizabeth25
text: The pizza is usually good but the last time I ordered they messed up my pizzas and were extremely rude to me about it, like it was MY fault. I ordered the double deal or whatever itâ€™s called where you get two 2-topping pizzas and they read â€¦More

name: Indigo Feral
text: Listen, these guys have a bread problem. Their pizza crust is kinda meh. Their sandwich rolls are a little lackluster. And, I'm not gonna lie, sometimes they get the little details of your order wrong. But guys. People. â€¦More

name: nunyabusiness
text: Delivery was fast, but the pizza left something to be desired. It was wwaayy to cheesy and overcooked, almost burnt. I saw the reviews and thought it was going to be great but wont be ordering from there again.

name: Dinero Hayez
text: Review the pizza is that best around i love it every time i come in great place to eat and relax so stop by and give it a try u wont be unhappy i promise

name: Mitch Malesko
text: My new favorite pizza place. I love their flavorful vegetarian pizza.

name: Baraka Ongeri
text: Great specialty pizzas! Also the subs are REALLY good.

name: Jessica Lindsay
text: I absolutely love their Pizza. The best around!!

name: maggie honeycutt
text: The pizza at cottage inn is the best pizza i have had any where.

name: Najee A.
text: This place had really good pizza

name: bosko srbljanin
text: Best pizza around!!! Friendly staff and super fast delivery!

name: Breanna Davis
text: Great customer service and tasty food ðŸ˜‹

name: cedricissofly
text: Great sauce options.

name: Martin Webb
text: Friendly service!

name: Sherry Holloway
text: Just watch a cook with no glove touching the dough this is it for me nasty and unsanitary smh 11/4/2017 both the white and black girl touching your food no gloves or washing there hands

name: Taylor Thompson
text: This is the nastiest pizza ever !!!

name: Trey Lindsay
text: I love there pizza, Friendly staff , when I went there on vacation

name: Nicholas Vankoevering
text: Best pizza in town!!!

name: Jordan Covington
text: Best pizza in town !!!

name: Debbie Masse
text: Excellent, Cottage Inn is now in Greensboro!

name: Eren Figueroa
text: Overpriced. Worst pizza ive had.

name: Alexander Alie
text: Best Pizza I have ever had!!
